text: James Anthony Krenn (born October 13, 1959) is an American comedian and radio personality, best known for his work on The DVE Morning Show on WDVE in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania from 1988-December 6, 2011. Krenn and former partner Scott Paulsen provided most of the voices for the Nickelodeon stop motion animation series, Action League Now!. ==Other websites== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Pittsburgh Category:American voice actors
title: Jim Krenn
